title: Game Crashing. Please Help.
body: Sometimes when i'm done with champ select it goes blackscreen for a sec a then it says the Bug splat Game crashed and it wont let me go into the game again and it gives me the Leaver buster and its very fustraiting.

replies.body:
Bugsplats typically indicate that there's something up with either your system's drivers or your hardware. Our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) will talk you through the steps that commonly resolve these issues, so I strongly recommend giving them a go.

Please let me know if these steps resolve the issue.

Thank you very much! But, 
The game fixed Itself when i opened the client.
So i guess i {{champion:83}} 'ed out of it.
